alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 10:29AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1028 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross Creek, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Micanopy, McIntosh, Flemington, Lochloosa and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
